members.name: anchor
members.descriptionHtml: <a> element.

members.name: button
members.descriptionHtml: <button> element.

members.name: dismissMenu
members.descriptionHtml: If there is a menu associated with this button and it is visible, this will dismiss the menu

members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to the button.

members.name: openMenu
members.descriptionHtml: If there is a menu associated with this button and it is visible, this will open the menu. Params are optional overrides to the ones defined in 'menuProps' to apply to just this instance of opening the menu.

members.name: allowDisabledFocus
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the button can have focus in disabled mode

members.name: ariaDescription
members.descriptionHtml:
Detailed description of the button for the benefit of screen readers.

Besides the compound button, other button types will need more information provided to screen reader.

members.name: ariaHidden
members.descriptionHtml: If provided and is true it adds an 'aria-hidden' attribute instructing screen readers to ignore the element.

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: The aria label of the button for the benefit of screen readers.

members.name: buttonType
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated at v1.2.3, to be removed at \>= v2.0.0. Use specific button component instead.

members.name: checked
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the button is checked

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, additional class name to provide on the root element.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the IButton interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: data
members.descriptionHtml: Any custom data the developer wishes to associate with the menu item.

members.name: description
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the description text if applicable (for compound buttons.) Deprecated, use `secondaryText` instead.

members.name: disabled
members.descriptionHtml: Whether the button is disabled

members.name: getClassNames
members.descriptionHtml: Method to provide the classnames to style a button. The default value for this prop is the getClassnames func defined in BaseButton.classnames.

members.name: getSplitButtonClassNames
members.descriptionHtml: Method to provide the classnames to style a button. The default value for this prop is the getClassnames func defined in BaseButton.classnames.

members.name: href
members.descriptionHtml: If provided, this component will be rendered as an anchor.

members.name: iconProps
members.descriptionHtml: The props for the icon shown in the button.

members.name: keytipProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional keytip for this button

members.name: menuAs
members.descriptionHtml: Render a custom menu in place of the normal one.

members.name: menuIconProps
members.descriptionHtml: The props for the icon shown when providing a menu dropdown.

members.name: menuProps
members.descriptionHtml: Props for button menu. Providing this will default to showing the menu icon. See menuIconProps for overriding how the default icon looks. Providing this in addition of onClick and setting the split property to true will render a SplitButton.

members.name: menuTriggerKeyCode
members.descriptionHtml: Provides a custom KeyCode that can be used to open the button menu. The default KeyCode is the down arrow. A value of null can be provided to disable the key codes for opening the button menu.

members.name: onAfterMenuDismiss
members.descriptionHtml: Callback that runs after Button's contextualmenu was closed (removed from the DOM)

members.name: onMenuClick
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback when menu is clicked.

members.name: onRenderAriaDescription
members.descriptionHtml: Custom render function for the aria description element.

members.name: onRenderChildren
members.descriptionHtml: Custom render function for rendering the button children.

members.name: onRenderDescription
members.descriptionHtml: Custom render function for the desciption text.

members.name: onRenderIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Custom render function for the icon

members.name: onRenderMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated at v6.3.2, to be removed at \>= v7.0.0. Use `menuAs` instead.

members.name: onRenderMenuIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Custom render function for button menu icon

members.name: onRenderText
members.descriptionHtml: Custom render function for the label text.

members.name: persistMenu
members.descriptionHtml: Menu will not be created or destroyed when opened or closed, instead it will be hidden. This will improve perf of the menu opening but could potentially impact overall perf by having more elemnts in the dom. Should only be used when perf is important. Note: This may increase the amount of time it takes for the button itself to mount.

members.name: primary
members.descriptionHtml: Changes the visual presentation of the button to be emphasized (if defined)

members.name: primaryDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: If set to true and if this is a splitButton (split == true) then the primary action of a split button is disabled.

members.name: rootProps
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated at v0.56.2, to be removed at \>= v1.0.0. Just pass in button props instead. they will be mixed into the button/anchor element rendered by the component.

members.name: secondaryText
members.descriptionHtml: Description of the action this button takes. Only used for compound buttons

members.name: split
members.descriptionHtml: If set to true, and if menuProps and onClick are provided, the button will render as a SplitButton. Defaults to false.

members.name: splitButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Accessible label for the dropdown chevron button if this button is split.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Custom styling for individual elements within the button DOM.

members.name: text
members.descriptionHtml: Text to render button label. If text is supplied, it will override any string in button children. Other children components will be passed through after the text.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by HOC.

members.name: toggle
members.descriptionHtml: Whether button is a toggle button with distinct on and off states. This should be true for buttons that permanently change state when a press event finishes, such as a volume mute button.

members.name: toggled
members.descriptionHtml: Any custom data the developer wishes to associate with the menu item. Deprecated, use `checked` if setting state.

members.name: uniqueId
members.descriptionHtml: Unique id to identify the item. Typically a duplicate of key value.

members.name: description
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the description text if applicable (for compound buttons.)

members.name: descriptionChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the description text when the button is checked.

members.name: descriptionDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the description text when the button is disabled.

members.name: descriptionHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the description text when the button is hovered.

members.name: descriptionPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the description text when the button is pressed.

members.name: flexContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the flexbox container within the root element.

members.name: icon
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the icon on the near side of the label.

members.name: iconChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the icon when the button is checked.

members.name: iconDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the icon when the button is disabled.

members.name: iconExpanded
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the icon on the near side of the label when expanded.

members.name: iconExpandedHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the icon on the near side of the label when expanded and hovered.

members.name: iconHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the icon on the near side of the label on hover.

members.name: iconPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the icon on the near side of the label when pressed.

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the text content of the button.

members.name: labelChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the text content when the button is checked.

members.name: labelDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the text content when the button is disabled.

members.name: labelHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the text content when the button is hovered.

members.name: menuIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the menu chevron.

members.name: menuIconChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the menu chevron when the button is checked.

members.name: menuIconDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the menu chevron when the button is disabled.

members.name: menuIconExpanded
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the menu chevron when expanded.

members.name: menuIconExpandedHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the menu chevron when expanded and hovered.

members.name: menuIconHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the menu chevron on hover.

members.name: menuIconPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the menu chevron when pressed.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the root element in the default enabled, non-toggled state.

members.name: rootChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the root element in a checked state, layered on top of the root style.

members.name: rootCheckedDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on hover in a checked, disabled state

members.name: rootCheckedHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on hover in a checked, enabled state

members.name: rootCheckedPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on pressed in a checked, enabled state

members.name: rootDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the root element in a disabled state, layered on top of the root style.

members.name: rootExpanded
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on when menu is expanded in the default, enabled, non-toggled state.

members.name: rootExpandedHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on hover in a expanded state on hover

members.name: rootFocused
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on focus in the default, enabled, non-toggled state.

members.name: rootHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on hover in the default, enabled, non-toggled state.

members.name: rootPressed
members.descriptionHtml: Style override applied to the root on pressed in the default, enabled, non-toggled state.

members.name: screenReaderText
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the screen reader text.

members.name: secondaryText
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the description text if applicable (for compound buttons.)

members.name: splitButtonContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the container div around a SplitButton element

members.name: splitButtonContainerChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Style for container div around a SplitButton element when the button is checked.

members.name: splitButtonContainerCheckedHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style for container div around a SplitButton element when the button is checked and hovered.

members.name: splitButtonContainerDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the container div around a SplitButton element in a disabled state

members.name: splitButtonContainerFocused
members.descriptionHtml: Style for container div around a SplitButton element when the button is focused.

members.name: splitButtonContainerHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style for container div around a SplitButton element when the button is hovered.

members.name: splitButtonDivider
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the divider element that appears between the button and menu button for a split button.

members.name: splitButtonFlexContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the SplitButton FlexContainer.

members.name: splitButtonMenuButton
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the SplitButton menu button

members.name: splitButtonMenuButtonChecked
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the SplitButton menu button element in a checked state

members.name: splitButtonMenuButtonDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the SplitButton menu button element in a disabled state.

members.name: splitButtonMenuButtonExpanded
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the SplitButton menu button element in an expanded state

members.name: splitButtonMenuIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the SplitButton menu icon element

members.name: splitButtonMenuIconDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the SplitButton menu icon element in a disabled state

members.name: textContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the text container within the flexbox container element (and contains the text and description).
